stheno.random module¶

class stheno.random.Normal(*args, **kw_args)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.random.RandomVector

Normal random variable.

mean¶

Mean of the distribution.

Type

column vector

mean_is_zero¶

True if it is determined that mean is all zeros.

Type

bool

var¶

Variance of the distribution.

Type

matrix

Parameters

  • mean (column vector, optional) – Mean of the distribution. Defaults to zero.

  • var (matrix) – Variance of the distribution.

property dim¶

Dimensionality.

property dtype¶

Data type.

entropy()[source]¶

Compute the entropy.

Returns

The entropy.

Return type

scalar

kl = <function <function Normal.kl> with 1 method(s)>[source]¶
lmatmul(other)[source]¶
logpdf(x)[source]¶

Compute the log-pdf.

Parameters

x (input) – Values to compute the log-pdf of.

Returns

Log-pdf for every input in x. If it can be

determined that the list contains only a single log-pdf, then the list is flattened to a scalar.

Return type

list[tensor]

property m2¶

Second moment.

marginals()[source]¶

Get the marginals.

Returns

A tuple containing the predictive means and lower and

upper 95% central credible interval bounds.

Return type

tuple

property mean¶

Mean.

property mean_is_zero¶

The mean is zero.

sample(num=1, noise=None)[source]¶

Sample from the distribution.

Parameters

  • num (int) – Number of samples.

  • noise (scalar, optional) – Variance of noise to add to the samples. Must be positive.

Returns

Samples as rank 2 column vectors.

Return type

tensor

Variance.
